attributes.action: Stop all asylum from any country to the british isles that arent made off shore.
attributes.additional_details:
The cause of an influx of illegal immaigtation and legal asylum application are weighing  a burden on the economy, benifit system, national health service,prison and juditial systems  And the cause of unrest amongs british citizens. 
 To eliminate foreighn criminal activity on british soil for protection of this and future generations.
attributes.background: Ban all and any application for asylum from all natonalities  that arent made prior to entry of the uk.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.  

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You may wish to sign this petition which calls for all asylum requests to not be considered for two years https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/730643
